revised_title: Crystallography and Optical Properties of Herapathite
tldr: The author, William Bird Herapath, conducted further research on the properties of the Sulphate of Iodo-Quinine or Herapathite, focusing on its crystallography and optical relations. He discovered new prisms with complementary optical characters and discussed the effects of different solvents on the development of crystal forms. He also examined the chemical properties of Herapathite, including its solubility in various substances.
